cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 31st Oct 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 31st Oct 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Basic 6 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Spacious 6 bed dorm, everyone gets their own single bed (no bunks!). There is a heater and hot water bottles in all rooms

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Basic Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Private room with one double bed for two guests. Access to shared bathroom facilities. The room has a heater and wifi access

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only

privates.labelDescription: Private room with one double bed for two guests. Private bathroom attached to the room. The room has a heater and wifi access

privates.name: Standard 4 Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Private room with 4 single beds made up with crisp, clean sheets and comfortable pillows. There is a heater, extra blankets and hot water bottles in the room.
